name: Uncursed
description:
Story: The village seems to have been cursed you have been sent to find a magical object called "The sphere" hidden deep in the living forest, a part of the forest populated by sentient plants.

Controls:

M - open the manual, a short list of controls

Esc - pause the game

Left click - attack or interact

Right click - throw a rock (aim using mouse)

F/Shift whilst on ground - dash and temporarily phase through enemies

A&D/Left&Right - walk

W/Up - attack upwards and convert vertical momentum into horizontal or enter doors

S/Down whilst not on ground - attack downwards and temporarily phase through enemies

Space - jump
